spec.brief: top of stream-based SSR FFT (fixed data type)

parameters.name: ssr_fft_param_struct
parameters.description: SSR FFT parameter structure that can be redefined by users

parameters.name: T_in
parameters.description: type of input data

ports.name: fftOutStrm
ports.type: hls::stream< typename FFTOutputTraits< ssr_fft_param_struct::N, ssr_fft_param_struct::R, ssr_fft_param_struct::scaling_mode, ssr_fft_param_struct::transform_direction, ssr_fft_param_struct::butterfly_rnd_mode, typename FFTInputTraits< T_in >::T_castedType >::T_FFTOutType >[ssr_fft_param_struct::R]

spec.brief: top of stream-based SSR FFT (fixed data type)

parameters.name: ssr_fft_param_struct
parameters.description: SSR FFT parameter structure that can be redefined by users

parameters.name: t_instanceID
parameters.description: SSR FFT INSTANCE ID

parameters.name: T_in
parameters.description: type of input data

ports.name: fftOutStrm
ports.type: hls::stream< typename FFTOutputTraits< ssr_fft_param_struct::N, ssr_fft_param_struct::R, ssr_fft_param_struct::scaling_mode, ssr_fft_param_struct::transform_direction, ssr_fft_param_struct::butterfly_rnd_mode, typename FFTInputTraits< T_in >::T_castedType >::T_FFTOutType >[ssr_fft_param_struct::R]

spec.brief: Top of 2D FFT kernel (fixed data type), provides DFT/Inverse DFT of 2D data.

parameters.name: t_memWidth
parameters.description: Number of streaming into the kernel in parallel

parameters.name: t_numRows
parameters.description: Number of rows in complex 2-d input matrix

parameters.name: t_numCols
parameters.description: Number of columns in complex 2-d input matrix

parameters.name: t_numKernels
parameters.description: Number of 1D Kernels used row/column wise

parameters.name: t_ssrFFTParamsRowProc
parameters.description: Gives parameters for 1-d fft kernel used on rows

parameters.name: t_ssrFFTParamsColProc
parameters.description: Gives parameters for 1-d fft kernel used on columns

parameters.name: t_rowInstanceIDOffset
parameters.description: The row instance ID offset

parameters.name: t_colInstanceIDOffset
parameters.description: The column instance ID offset

parameters.name: T_elemType
parameters.description: Data type of the individual matrix elements

ports.name: p_memWideStreamOut
ports.type: typename WideTypeDefs< t_memWidth, typename FFTIOTypes< t_ssrFFTParamsColProc, typename FFTIOTypes< t_ssrFFTParamsRowProc, T_elemType >::T_outType >::T_outType >::WideIFStreamType &

spec.brief: Top of 2D FFT kernel (float data type), provides DFT/Inverse DFT of 2D data.

parameters.name: t_memWidth
parameters.description: Number of streaming into the kernel in parallel

parameters.name: t_numRows
parameters.description: Number of rows in complex 2-d input matrix

parameters.name: t_numCols
parameters.description: Number of columns in complex 2-d input matrix

parameters.name: t_numKernels
parameters.description: Number of 1D Kernels used row/column wise

parameters.name: t_ssrFFTParamsRowProc
parameters.description: Gives parameters for 1-d fft kernel used on rows

parameters.name: t_ssrFFTParamsColProc
parameters.description: Gives parameters for 1-d fft kernel used on columns

parameters.name: t_rowInstanceIDOffset
parameters.description: The row instance ID offset

parameters.name: t_colInstanceIDOffset
parameters.description: The column instance ID offset

parameters.name: T_elemType
parameters.description: Data type of the individual matrix elements

ports.name: p_memWideStreamOut
ports.type: typename WideTypeDefs< t_memWidth, typename FFTIOTypes< t_ssrFFTParamsColProc, typename FFTIOTypes< t_ssrFFTParamsRowProc, T_elemType >::T_outType >::T_outType >::WideIFStreamType &
